mapper.select: select c.id id ,g.name gname ,g.price gprice ,g.description description,co.username cname from a_collect c,a_goods g,a_customer co where c.goods_id=g.id and c.customer_id=co.id

select c.id id ,g.name gname ,g.price gprice ,g.description description,co.username cname from a_collect c,a_goods g,a_customer co where c.goods_id=g.id and c.customer_id=co.id and (g.name like #{word} or co.username like #{word})
select * from a_collect where goods_id=#{gid} and customer_id=#{cid}
